original_text: And the people were waiting for Zechariah, and they were wondering at his delay in the temple.
korean_text: 백성들이 사가랴를 기다리며 그가 성전 안에서 지체함을 이상히 여기더라

sentences.original_text: And the people were waiting for Zechariah
and they were wondering at his delay in the temple.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 성전에서 그가 지체되는 것을 이상히 여겼습니다.
